meanings.meaning_en_US: A piece of ground, often near a house, used for growing flowers, fruit, or vegetables.

examples.sentence: She spends her weekends tending to her [garden].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在週末花時間照顧她的花園。

examples.sentence: The [garden] is full of blooming flowers in spring.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這個花園在春天裡充滿盛開的花朵。

examples.sentence: They have a vegetable [garden] in their backyard.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們的後院有一個菜園。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The number equivalent to the product of a thousand and a thousand; 1,000,000.

examples.sentence: There are over a [million] stars in the sky.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 天空中有超過一百萬顆星星。

examples.sentence: She won a [million] dollars in the lottery.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在彩票中贏得了一百萬美元。

examples.sentence: The population of the city reached a [million].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 該市的人口達到一百萬。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A very young child, especially one newly or recently born.

examples.sentence: The [baby] is sleeping peacefully.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 嬰兒正安靜地睡著。

examples.sentence: She holds the [baby] close to her heart.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她將嬰兒緊緊抱在心口。

examples.sentence: The [baby] giggled at the funny faces.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 嬰兒對搞笑的臉龐咯咯笑。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To move at a speed faster than a walk.

examples.sentence: He decided to [run] in the marathon this year.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他決定今年參加馬拉松賽跑

examples.sentence: They [run] home every day after school.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他們每天放學後都跑回家

examples.sentence: She can [run] very fast for her age.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 對於她的年齡來說，她能跑得很快

meanings.meaning_en_US: A period of running or exercise.

examples.sentence: I go for a [run] every morning.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我每天早上去跑步

examples.sentence: Her daily [run] keeps her fit.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她每天的跑步讓她保持健康

examples.sentence: He is training for a long-distance [run].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他正在訓練參加長跑

meanings.meaning_en_US: A fabric consisting of a network of filaments, used for catching fish or other animals.

examples.sentence: He used a [net] to catch fish.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他用了網來捕魚。

examples.sentence: The [net] was tangled in the branches.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 網被纏在樹枝上。

examples.sentence: She bought a [net] for her gardening.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她為她的園藝買了一個網。

meanings.meaning_en_US: Liked or admired by many people.

examples.sentence: This movie is very [popular] among teenagers.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這部電影在青少年中非常受歡迎。

examples.sentence: His ideas are [popular] on social media.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他的想法在社交媒體上非常受歡迎。

examples.sentence: She is [popular] in her school for her achievements.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她因為成就而在學校中很受歡迎。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A thin layer or coating.

examples.sentence: There was a [film] of dust on the table.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 桌子上有一層灰塵。

examples.sentence: She removed the [film] from the window.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她從窗戶上移除了薄膜。

examples.sentence: A [film] of ice covered the pond.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 池塘上覆蓋著一層冰。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A motion picture, especially a feature length film.

examples.sentence: I watched a great [film] last night.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我昨晚看了一部精彩的電影。

examples.sentence: The [film] received several awards.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 這部電影獲得了幾個獎項。

examples.sentence: We are going to see a new [film] this weekend.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我們這個週末要去看一部新電影。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To place something in a particular position.

examples.sentence: Please [put] the book on the table.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請把書放在桌子上。

examples.sentence: He decided to [put] his plans into action.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他決定開始實行他的計畫。

examples.sentence: You should [put] your phone away during the meeting.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你在會議期間應該把手機收起來。

meanings.meaning_en_US: To make an attempt or effort to accomplish something.

examples.sentence: I will [try] my best to finish the project.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我會盡力完成這個項目

examples.sentence: He decided to [try] a new recipe for dinner.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他決定試做一個新的晚餐食譜

examples.sentence: She always tells me to [try] again if I fail.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她總是告訴我如果失敗就要再嘗試一次

meanings.meaning_en_US: To become aware of something.

examples.sentence: Did you [notice] the changes in the schedule?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你有注意到日程的變更嗎？

examples.sentence: He failed to [notice] the warning signs.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他未能注意到警告標誌。

examples.sentence: I just [noticed] the time!
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我剛注意到時間！

meanings.meaning_en_US: A written or printed announcement.

examples.sentence: The [notice] on the board is important.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 公告板上的通知很重要。

examples.sentence: Please read the [notice] carefully.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 請仔細閱讀通知。

examples.sentence: He put up a [notice] about the meeting.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他張貼了一個關於會議的通知。

meanings.meaning_en_US: A superhuman being, worshipped as having power over nature or human fortunes.

examples.sentence: Many cultures have their own concept of [God].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 許多文化都有自己對神的概念

examples.sentence: In times of trouble, people often turn to [God].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 在困難時期，人們經常向神祈求

examples.sentence: She felt a deep connection to [God].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她感到與神有深刻的聯繫

meanings.meaning_en_US: The uppermost or front part of the body, containing the brain, eyes, ears, nose, and mouth.

examples.sentence: She nodded her [head] in agreement.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她點了點頭表示同意。

examples.sentence: He wears a hat on his [head].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他在頭上戴著一頂帽子。

examples.sentence: The child has a fever and is holding his [head].
examples.translation_zh_TW: 孩子發燒，正在捂著他的頭。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The technology of signaling and communicating using radio waves.

examples.sentence: He listens to [radio] every morning.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他每天早上都聽無線電

examples.sentence: The [radio] broadcast started at noon.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 無線電廣播在中午開始

examples.sentence: She works at a local [radio] station.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她在當地的無線電台工作

meanings.meaning_en_US: Up to the point in time or the event mentioned.

examples.sentence: I will wait [until] you arrive.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 我會等直到你到達。

examples.sentence: The store is open [until] 10 PM.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 商店營業到晚上10點。

examples.sentence: You can stay here [until] the morning.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你可以在這裡待到早上。

meanings.meaning_en_US: The property possessed by an object of producing different sensations on the eye as a result of the way it reflects or emits light.

examples.sentence: The sky turned a beautiful shade of [color] at sunset.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 夕陽下天空變成了美麗的顏色

examples.sentence: What [color] do you prefer for the walls?
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你喜歡牆壁的什麼顏色？

examples.sentence: She chose a bright red [color] for her dress.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她為她的裙子選了一種鮮紅色

meanings.meaning_en_US: To give color to something.

examples.sentence: Children love to [color] pictures.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 孩子們喜歡給圖片上色

examples.sentence: You can [color] the text using different shades.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 你可以用不同的顏色給文本上色

examples.sentence: She decided to [color] her hair blue.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她決定把頭髮染藍

meanings.meaning_en_US: To or at a distance from a particular place.

examples.sentence: He moved [away] to start a new life.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 他搬走了以開始新生活。

examples.sentence: Don't stray too [away] from the path.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 不要離小路太遠。

examples.sentence: She is living [away] from home for the first time.
examples.translation_zh_TW: 她第一次離家生活。
